ActJudges Act
SubjectDonald Stevenson ** WIDOWER'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Carolyn A. Layden-Stevenson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to DONALD STEVENSON widower of the Hon. Carolyn A. Layden-Stevenson, a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, effective June 28, 2012
